item.description:

[quote=“i nelson i, post:8, topic:259186”][quote author=x blitz x link=topic=342246.msg2646574#msg2646574 date=1233267984]

you mean change it so that when a new player logs in they log in a diff area then the original etc etc yes and i can help.

no, i can do that…i meen when any player logs in even if it isnt there 1st time, they automatically go to certain co ords

Easy, do it when you load the char file, instead of loading the coords saved, load your custom coords.
[/quote]

would this be in playerhandler or player.java or somewhere else?[/quote]
It’s in the Client class. Look for something like,

teleportToX = 
teleportToY =

item.title: [solved] thanks x blitz x and chassy13
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:

[quote=“i nelson i, post:3, topic:259186”][quote author=Bandos_Pk link=topic=342246.msg2646553#msg2646553 date=1233267373]
you mean change it so that when a new player logs in they log in a diff area then the original etc etc yes and i can help.
[/quote]

no, i can do that…i meen when any player logs in even if it isnt there 1st time, they automatically go to certain co ords[/quote]
Easy, do it when you load the char file, instead of loading the coords saved, load your custom coords.
